name: LittleHaiku
0:
”Alexa ask Little Haiku to read me a haiku”
”Alexa tell Little Haiku to read a poem”
”Alexa open Little Haiku and tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: little haiku
des: Haiku is a type of short-form poetry originally from Japan. Little Haiku offers you a collection of uplifting and lighthearted haikus that lighten up your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
